Articles.Content:
![sv0bX7U.png](http://i.imgur.com/sv0bX7U.png) I've ended up leaving this one for a month, though those who read my Asteroid Based mission report ["The Asteroid Sentinels"](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127917-The-Asteroid-Sentinels-KSP-Graphic-Novel-%28Series2E2-The-Asteroid-Games%29) will have seen the craft in action.

 This replica uses only parts from the Asteroid Day mod/Stock. I have equipped the telescope with a Basic Falcon 9 Replica which also has (for effects) Cryogenic Vents. The Sentinel Space Telescope is planned to be launched from 2017-2018, where it will fly by Venus to lower it's orbit, to look out towards the Earth's Orbit to find Asteroids that could hit Earth.

[Download (KerbalX)](http://kerbalx.com/SaturnianBlue/Sentinel)

![VEcV2Dh.png](http://i.imgur.com/VEcV2Dh.png)

Stats: 145 parts, 2600 kg telescope, Telescope has 500 m/s of Delta-V.

Thanks for viewing!

Wow, just another reason to have the Asteroid Day mod stock..

Looks amazing, IMHO. Repped!
